name: graphql-server
description: GraphQL server with JSON Web Token authentication

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run flow
scripts.mongo:export: npm run mongo:export:users && npm run mongo:export:stories
scripts.mongo:export:users: docker run -v $PWD/data:/data --link mongodb-graphql:db --rm mongo:3.2 sh -c 'exec mongoexport -h "$DB_PORT_27017_TCP_ADDR:$DB_PORT_27017_TCP_PORT" -d graphql -c users --out /data/users.json'
scripts.mongo:export:stories: docker run -v $PWD/data:/data --link mongodb-graphql:db --rm mongo:3.2 sh -c 'exec mongoexport -h "$DB_PORT_27017_TCP_ADDR:$DB_PORT_27017_TCP_PORT" -d graphql -c stories --out /data/stories.json'
scripts.mongo:import: npm run mongo:import:users && npm run mongo:import:stories
scripts.mongo:import:users: docker run -v $PWD/data:/data --link mongodb-graphql:db --rm mongo:3.2 sh -c 'exec mongoimport -h "$DB_PORT_27017_TCP_ADDR:$DB_PORT_27017_TCP_PORT" -d graphql -c users --drop --file /data/users.json'
scripts.mongo:import:stories: docker run -v $PWD/data:/data --link mongodb-graphql:db --rm mongo:3.2 sh -c 'exec mongoimport -h "$DB_PORT_27017_TCP_ADDR:$DB_PORT_27017_TCP_PORT" -d graphql -c stories --drop --file /data/stories.json'
scripts.mongo:dba: docker run -it --link mongodb-graphql:db --rm mongo:3.2 sh -c 'exec mongo "$DB_PORT_27017_TCP_ADDR:$DB_PORT_27017_TCP_PORT/graphql"'
scripts.mongo:stop: docker stop mongodb-graphql 1> /dev/null && docker rm mongodb-graphql 1> /dev/null

author: Dillon de Voor (http://crocodillon.com)
